description: MRP files are used by China Mobile phones that do not support Java . The program files are typically much smaller than .JAR Java apps, roughly one-third the size.

To install an MRP app on a phone, move the file directly to the memory card of the phone using a USB connection. Then, to complete the installation, place the files in the appropriate programs folder with the other MRP files, which may be one of the following folders: Mythroad , Mulgame , Mrapp , Games .

common_filenames.description: [application].mrp - The MRP file will be named after the name of the application, e.g., the Facebook application would be facebook.mrp.
